thread.title: Chrissy Teigen wakes up after Oscars nap and asks what she's missed
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen wakes up after Oscars nap and asks what she's missed

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Chrissy Teigen wakes up after Oscars nap and asks what she's missed
text:
Showbiz Chrissy Teigen wakes up after Oscars nap and asks what she's missed The star joined in to poke fun at her own meme after taking a doze during the Academy Awards Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Chrissy Teigen gets caught napping during the Oscars Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chrissy Teigen has brilliantly responded to the jokes doing the rounds after she seemed to fall asleep during the Oscars. 
The model showed off her sense of humour and self awareness yet again after looking like she'd dropped off during Casey Affleck's acceptance speech at the Academy Awards. 
Taking to Twitter the morning after, she brilliantly responded to the hilarious moment, writing: "Just woke up what happened (sic)" 
She was seen with her eyes closed and head to the side resting on her man John Legend's shoulder as it seemed she dozed of during the ceremony on Sunday night. 
Although Chrissy is yet to reveal exactly what was going on, viewers and fans have taken to social media and they can certainly relate. Chrissy seemed to nod off (Photo: itschristyyall/Twitter) 
"When @chrissyteigen falls asleep at THE OSCARS and I can def relate because I fall asleep during much less exciting events. #spiritanimal (sic)," one tweeted. 
Another joked: "So epic! @chrissyteigen is my idol! I'm not the only one to fall asleep at long shows (sic)" Chrissy Teigen and John Legend (Photo: WireImage) 
Chrissy dropped a major leg bomb on the red carpet as she was spotted arriving earlier in the evening with her man John. 
He performed hits City of Stars and Audition (The Fools Who Dream) from blockbuster musical La La Land. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
